name: hypnos
description:
~ hypnos ~

Inspired by Myst, explore a strange island while discovering an intriguing plot. Features 30-60 minutes of exploration and puzzle-solving gameplay.

~

Controls:

WASD to move
Mouse to look
Click to activate
Escape for menu

Default gamepad settings are for Xbox 360 controllers, but double-check your Input settings to be sure. :)

~

This was the most fun I've ever had working on a project. Thank you to Sophie Houlden for hosting this Myst Jam!
